pull.title: Do not ask a UI question from bitcoind
pull.body: Fixes #8255 (we shouldn't ask to reindex when running without UI).

events.body: concept ACK. I was very confused when I thought it was a real question.

events.message: Do not ask a UI question from bitcoind

events.body:
Tested ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/1acf1db76fc3e07deb8f0f837934ea90383fedb5.

```
$ src/bitcoind -datadir=/store/tmp/testbtc 
: Load Error..
Please restart with -reindex or -reindex-chainstate to recover.
bitcoind: /home/orion/projects/bitcoin/bitcoin/src/scheduler.cpp:19: CScheduler::~CScheduler(): Assertion `nThreadsServicingQueue == 0' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
```

The CScheduler assertion issue is unrelated (this is issue #6735).

GUI correctly asks the question, also verified that Abort and OK give back the correct result.

issue.title: showmetrics interferes with start-up error prompts
issue.body: When -showmetrics is active, the "Do you want to rebuild the block database now?" prompt does not work (see https://forum.z.cash/t/zcash4win-beta-is-out/14155/13 ).

issue.title: Do not ask a UI question on metrics screen

labels.name: S-waiting-on-review
labels.description: Status: Awaiting review from the assignee but also interested parties.

comments.body: Please document the return value in case the question could not be asked of the user.
